Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: isolated. Sequence determined is the same as that deduced from cDNA.Activity: VaD1 inhibited the growth of fungi F. oxysporum f. sp. pisi (IC50 30-53.2 ug/ml), T.rubrum (IC50 > 500 ug/ml), S. epidermidis (IC50 36.6 ug/ml), X. campestris pv. vesicatoria (IC50 40.8 ug/ml), S.typhimurium (IC50 143.4 ug/ml), B.cereus (IC50 >500 ug/ml), E.coli (IC50 >500 ug/ml), E.carotovora pv. carotovora (IC50 1000 ug/ml), P.vulgaris (IC50 >1000 ug/ml), S.enteritidis (IC50 >1000 ug/ml), and P.syringae pv. syringae (IC50 >1000 ug/ml). VaD1 also inhibited in vitro protein synthesis and bruchid larval development. Updated 7/2021; 11/2023
Literature Information.Author: Chen G.-H. et al. Chen, C.-S.2005
Literature Information.Title: Cloning and characterization of a plant defensin VaD1 from Azuki Bean
